name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 2
name_original: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 2
description:
All the action, all the battle and all the feeling of the 2018 Monster Energy AMA Supercross Championship!
In the first chapter, we let you try how a Supercross rider races.
With Monster Energy Supercross - The official videogame 2, we will let you experience it as if you were one of them!
Live like a champion into the renewed Career Mode.
Join different activities following your own agenda - from Monday till the race weekend you’ll have challenges to complete, sponsors to attract, and meet fans to win amazing prizes!
Train hard in the Compound.
A huge are area where to free roam and test the custom rider skills facing challenges against rivals across 4 different layouts. It is here where you can try out in-air controls of the bike, in bends and cornering, in skids, In acceleration and in braking.
Face the competition as a hero.
Compete on the official tracks and more than 80 official riders from 250SX and 450SX, including the superstars Jason Anderson and Marvin Musquin and the highly anticipated rider by the Supercross fans: Eli Tomac!
Your face, your style, your own personality.
A brand-new level of customization with more than 3,000 items to create the bike of your dream with new aftermarket components, make your avatar your twin thanks to new options like earrings, cap, skin, hair, eye and eyebrow colors, beards and tattoos and celebrate your victory as you please.
After all, everyone has his/her own superstitious gesture!
An enhanced track editor.
Brand-new features and easy accessibility thanks to the in-game tutorial and renewed UI graphics. With the improved tool, designing, building and sharing your own customized tracks online with the community will be easier!
